title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7802.9 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7802.9 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations
(a) Denial of a request for records or amendment or correction of a record or
personal information: (1)
shall be in
writing, explaining the reasons therefor; and
(2)
shall identify the person to whom an
appeal may be directed. (b) A failure to grant or deny access to
records within five business days of the receipt of a request or within 30 days
of an acknowledgment of the receipt of a request, or a failure to respond to a
request for amendment or correction of a record or personal information within
30 business days of receipt of such a request, shall be construed as a denial
that may be appealed. (c) Any such
denial may be appealed to, Deputy Commissioner for Operations, State Energy

Office, Two Rockefeller Plaza, Albany, NY 12223. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7802.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
